title: "Another Instance of the client is already open"
body:
Just got home from work, turned on my laptop to enjoy some good ole league...
And I get that message.

How is that possible?
I checked my task manager, killed all processes related to league, waited a few minutes, tried to launch the game again and Tada!
Seems to be happening to a lot of people here recently.

Now, I tried to launch the game as an Admin and even used the admin launch in the game folder.
The LoL splash appears, poofs, then displays that another client is already in use.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Hmmm...to be honest, I am not entirely sure.  It is possible that the last time that you closed down League, it didn't close properly causing the window to pop up.  Does this consistently happen every single time that you close league and go to re-open it?  Or was it just this single time?

Reply back if you're still having issues!

Not to be an ass...but did you read what I said in the beginning of the thread?
I had just gotten home from work and TURNED ON my laptop, launched the game, and got that message.
How is it possible to have an instance of the game running when the computer was Off?
After a restart, same scenario.

I had this problem in the past after the update for 6.9 patch...required me to reinstall the client after a 101% removal.
(removed all traces of League from the system, including any and all registry keys)

I'm not having any issues now since I went Tech Nerd about it all.
